name: Mom Binzel's Turkey Stuffing
comments: This can be cooked inside the turkey
ingredients: 1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning, or to taste
instructions: Cube bread and let sit at room temp. half a day. Cook celery and part of onion in about 1 c. water for about ten minutes. Add remaining onion to bread. Sprinkle bread with seasonings; cut up turkey heart/liver and add to bread. Mix.
Add butter to cooking celery and onions. When butter is melted and veggies are cooked, remove from heat and slowly pour over bread mixture while tossing, mixing thoroughly.
Cover 9x13" pan with foil and bake at 350 degrees for about 30 minutes.
